meanings.sent1: The toy had a discoidal shape.
meanings.sent2: The coin was discoidal and shiny.
meanings.sent3: The discoidal pizza looked funny on the round plate.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as discoidal as the moon in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The UFO had a strange, discoidal appearance.

meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a disc.
meanings.sent1: The discoidal design on the rug was eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a discoidal pattern on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The discoidal clock ticked in a circular motion.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a discoidal quality, resonating like a record.
meanings.sent5: The discoidal mirror reflected light in all directions.

meanings.definition: Having a disc-like form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The discoidal object rolled smoothly on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The discoidal button was easy to press.
meanings.sent3: The discoidal cookie jar held all the treats.
meanings.sent4: Her discoidal earrings gleamed under the light.
meanings.sent5: The discoidal shield protected the warrior in battle.
